name: undetectable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
impossible to notice or discover: The moons of Jupiter are undetectable by the naked eye. The medication he takes every day has reduced the amount of virus in his bloodstream to undetectable levels.
More examplesFewer examplesThe effect is so small as to be almost undetectable.Several athletes confessed to using undetectable performance-enhancing drugs.A 5 percent voltage reduction is virtually undetectable by customers.Radio astronomy is the study of radio waves emitted by objects in space that may be otherwise undetectable.
